title: sri vallabam
sahitya:
shrI vallabham bhajE nIla jaladAbham shrI padmanAbham shrtEtara durlabham

anupallavi

 shrIvatsa kaustubha kaumOdakI dharam shrIdharam dAmOdharam bhadra sAgaram

caraNam

 dIna sharaNyam purANam nArAyaNam dIpta vadanam danuja vidAraNam 
pInakaruNam bhavAbdhi santAraNam pItAmbaram vana tulasI vibhUSaNam
